description:
Interface presented in English. 
 
The premiere cbr/cbz reader for the HP TouchPad, ComicShelf HD brings your comic collection to the world of webOS tablets for a full viewing experience. 
 
Simply put your comic book files in the "comics" folder in the USB storage area and the rest is pretty straightforward and ready to go. 
 
Features: 
- Fully supports cbr, cbz, rar, and zip file formats 
- Multitouch pinch-zoom and panning
- Quickly hide controls for fullscreen viewing 
- Optional thumbnail shelf view 
- Optional read/unread system
- Intuitive layout optimized for the TouchPad 
- Able to change page by swiping left or right 
- Auto-resume option to continue reading where you leave off
- Share pages via email or MMS 
- Wallpaper setting support 
- Support for HP printing 
 
As of version 1.4.0, the long-awaited fit-by-width option is here!

NOTICE: This app does not include any cbr or cbz files. You'll need to get those yourself. 
 
More features and options are planned for future releases. 
 
Questions, comments, & issues can be directed to me via email or on Twitter @JayCanuck
